name: mp4frag
description: A parser that reads piped data from ffmpeg containing a fragmented mp4 and splits it into an initialization segment and media segments. Designed for streaming live video relayed from cctv cameras.

scripts.test: node tests/test && node tests/test2 && node tests/test3 && node tests/test4 && node tests/test5 && node tests/test6 && node tests/test7 && node tests/test8
scripts.doc: ./node_modules/.bin/jsdoc index.js -d docs && git commit -m "update docs" -- docs
scripts.codecs: npm run aac && npm run avc && npm run hevc

author: Kevin Godell <kevin.godell@gmail.com>
